name: The Very Organized Thief
storyline: So you are a thief. A very organized thief. And your objective is to find all the items on your checklist in the house and then escape.
summary: You play as a thief. The Very Organized Thief. Using your skills, discover how organized you are, in a game that plays with your expectations every time you play. Quickly search for items on your checklist that can be found scattered throughout the House. And then do what every thief would do, escape with the loot! Easy! Right?
